newsitem.title: USA: Electronic Hair says Intertec to buy shares.
newsitem.headline: Electronic Hair says Intertec to buy shares.

text.p: Electronic Hair Styling Inc said it has been advised that Intertec Holdings LP and its management and certain members of the company's senior management plan to begin a stock purchase plan.

The company, which currently has approximately 5.6 million shares outstanding, said that up to 200,000 shares of its common stock may be acquired in the open market or in privately-negotiated transactions. The sole limited partner
of Intertec Holdings LP is Intertec Ltd, a limited partnership in which Don Hoff and members of his immediate family hold 100 percent, Electronic Hair said.
